text: yahalawilila munhu yatoigwe kahona na abaho kotembela kwa mkongoja, munhu ayo yamtowile miyage nzambi zake zogeligwa kumgongo, lakini kamba munhu ayo yatoigwe hadaha kwinuka mulusazi, ayo yamtowile miyage yamulihe fungu da kipindi chose kiyawasile mulusazi na kolondigwa yamulole goya munhu ayo mbaka yahone.
